title: Republic Day Celebration 2026
details:
Dear Residents,

We are pleased to announce that Nextland Society will celebrate Republic Day on January 26, 2026.

Program Schedule:
- 8:00 AM: Flag Hoisting Ceremony
- 8:30 AM: Cultural Program by children
- 9:30 AM: Refreshments for all

Venue: Society Main Lawn

All residents are cordially invited to participate and make this event memorable.

Regards,
Cultural Committee
